entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
